Socialism didn't create this.... corruption and outside interference from multinational corporations who were losing billions of dollars due to the Nationalization of the industries there that were using Venezuela's natural resources up.... that's what created the current issues facing Venezuela. The U.S and other capitalist based governments have created a myth that a political system that's designed to help the poor and working class is actually the biggest threat to it, and, by way of poor education systems and a lack of oversight of the alt Right whackos on the TV, radio, and Internet spreading lies, hate, and fear they've created an army of misinformed, pissed off voters willing to elect a rapist with ties to the Russians and the Mafia President.

You are exactly right, ! Not every black person is a criminal, in fact I have several friends who are Doctors and professionals. Not all white people are racist. The ones of us who exist side by side and work hard, live within the law, and behave accordingly never make the news. It's a shame because just that would begin to heal the rift that has started to grow between the races. God bless you and yours.
